CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Have questions about our transaction tracking service? We're here to help!
CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: What can we help you with?
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Uncover detailed information about recent transactions with our powerful search and analysis tool
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay informed with instant updates on new transactions as they occur across multiple blockchains.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Access in-depth information including sender, recipient, amount, and transaction hash for each new transaction.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Set up personalized notifications for specific addresses, token types, or transaction amounts.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Monitor transactions across various blockchain networks from a single, user-friendly interface.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Easily sort and filter new transactions based on multiple criteria to find exactly what you're looking for.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Gain valuable insights with historical transaction data and trend analysis tools.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common queries about our transaction tracking app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What is this transaction details finder app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app is a powerful tool designed to help users discover and analyze new transaction details across various blockchain networks. It provides real-time updates and comprehensive information about recent transactions.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: The app connects to multiple blockchain networks, constantly scanning for new transactions. When a new transaction is detected, it retrieves and displays detailed information such as sender, recipient, amount, timestamp, and transaction hash.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Which blockchain networks does the app support?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Currently, our app supports major networks including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and several popular altcoins. We're continuously working to add support for more blockchain networks to provide comprehensive coverage.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I set up alerts for specific types of transactions?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, you can customize alerts based on various criteria such as transaction value, specific addresses, or smart contract interactions. This feature helps you stay informed about transactions that matter most to you.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is the transaction data provided by the app accurate and up-to-date?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely. Our app fetches data directly from blockchain nodes in real-time, ensuring the highest level of accuracy and timeliness. However, please note that confirmation times may vary depending on the specific blockchain network.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: TransactionTracker is an innovative app designed to help users find and analyze new transaction details across various blockchain networks. It provides real-time updates and comprehensive information about recent transactions.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Our app continuously scans blockchain networks for new transactions. When a new transaction is detected, it immediately retrieves and displays detailed information, including sender and receiver addresses, transaction amount, gas fees, and timestamp.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Which blockchain networks does TransactionTracker support?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: TransactionTracker currently supports major blockchain networks including Ethereum, Bitcoin, Binance Smart Chain, and Polygon. We are constantly working to add support for more networks to provide comprehensive coverage.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I set up alerts for specific transaction types or addresses?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes! TransactionTracker allows you to set up custom alerts based on various criteria such as specific wallet addresses, transaction amounts, or smart contract interactions. You'll receive instant notifications when transactions matching your criteria are detected.
